Articles.Content:
This is the Weirdbros rocket building service!

We like to make orbital cruisers, buses, cars and more.

Buses:

Cars:

Cruisers:

As you can see, we haven't made anything yet. However, you can reply to this thread with great rockets.

Rules:

1. Must be an orbital cruiser, an orbital car, or an orbital bus.

2. Must include a lifter stage with correct staging and minimal retro-rockets.

3. Reply must have a picture, description, title, and capabilaties (intermunar, interplanetary, also including if it can land there or not).

Weirdbros. Rockets Builders

The Path to the Future of Rocket Engineering!
